name: Phione
flavorText:
It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it
was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.

previous.name: Cresselia
previous.flavorText:
Shiny particles are released from
its wings like a veil. It is said
to represent the crescent moon.

next.name: Manaphy
next.flavorText:
Born on a cold seafloor, it
will swim great distances to
return to its birthplace.
